db:abstract.db:para: The AbstractAxis is a base element used for specialized axis elements.

db:listitem.db:para: BarCategoryAxis, CategoryAxis, DateTimeAxis, LogValueAxis, and ValueAxis

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: Each series can be bound to only one horizontal and vertical axis.
Properties and visibility of various axis elements such as axis line, title, labels, grid lines, and shades can be individually controlled.

db:section.db:title: alignment : alignment
db:section.db:para: The alignment of the axis. Can be Qt.AlignLeft, Qt.AlignRight, Qt.AlignBottom, or Qt.AlignTop.

db:section.db:title: color : color
db:section.db:para: The color of the axis and ticks.

db:section.db:title: gridVisible : bool
db:section.db:para: The visibility of the grid lines.

db:section.db:title: labelsAngle : int
db:section.db:para: The angle of the axis labels in degrees.

db:section.db:title: labelsColor : color
db:section.db:para: The color of the axis labels.

db:section.db:title: labelsFont : Font
db:section.db:para: The font of the axis labels.
See the Qt documentation for more details of Font.

db:section.db:title: labelsVisible : bool
db:section.db:para: Defines if axis labels are visible.

db:section.db:title: lineVisible : bool
db:section.db:para: The visibility of the axis line

db:section.db:title: minorGridVisible : bool
db:section.db:para: The visibility of the minor grid lines. Applies only to QValueAxis.

db:section.db:title: orientation : Qt.Orientation
db:section.db:para: The orientation of the axis. Fixed to either Qt.Horizontal or Qt.Vertical when the axis is set to a series.

db:section.db:title: reverse : alignment
db:section.db:para: The reverse property defines if reverse axis is used. By default the value is false.

Reverse axis is supported with line, spline, scatter and area series with cartesian chart. All axes of the same orientation attached to same series must be reversed if one is reversed or the behavior is undefined.

db:section.db:title: shadesBorderColor : color
db:section.db:para: The border (pen) color of the axis shades.

db:section.db:title: shadesColor : color
db:section.db:para: The fill (brush) color of the axis shades.

db:section.db:title: shadesVisible : bool
db:section.db:para: The visibility of the axis shades.

db:section.db:title: titleFont : Font
db:section.db:para: The font of the title of the axis.

db:section.db:title: titleText : String
db:section.db:para: The title of the axis. Empty by default. Axis titles support html formatting.

db:section.db:title: titleVisible : bool
db:section.db:para: The visibility of the axis title. By default the value is true.

db:section.db:title: visible : bool
db:section.db:para: The visibility of the axis.

db:section.db:title: onBorderColorChanged(QColor color)
db:section.db:para: Emitted if the border color of the axis shades is changed.

db:section.db:title: onColorChanged(QColor color)
db:section.db:para: Emitted if the color of the axis is changed.

db:section.db:title: onGridVisibleChanged(bool visible)
db:section.db:para: Visibility of the grid lines of the axis has changed to visible.

db:section.db:title: onLabelsAngleChanged(int angle)
db:section.db:para: The angle of the axis labels has changed to angle.

db:section.db:title: onLabelsColorChanged(QColor color)
db:section.db:para: Emitted if the color of the axis labels is changed.

db:section.db:title: onLabelsFontChanged(Font font)
db:section.db:para: The font of the axis labels has changed to font.

db:section.db:title: onLabelsVisibleChanged(bool visible)
db:section.db:para: Visibility of the labels of the axis has changed to visible.

db:section.db:title: onLineVisibleChanged(bool visible)
db:section.db:para: Visibility of the axis line has changed to visible.

db:section.db:title: onMinorGridVisibleChanged(bool visible)
db:section.db:para: Visibility of the minor grid lines of the axis has changed to visible.

db:section.db:title: onShadesColorChanged(QColor color)
db:section.db:para: Emitted if the color of the axis shades is changed.

db:section.db:title: onShadesVisibleChanged(bool visible)
db:section.db:para: Emitted if the visibility of the axis shades is changed to visible.

db:section.db:title: onTitleFontChanged(Font font)
db:section.db:para: The font of the axis title has changed to font.

db:section.db:title: onTitleTextChanged(String text)
db:section.db:para: The text of the axis title has changed to text.

db:section.db:title: onTitleVisibleChanged(bool visible)
db:section.db:para: Visibility of the title text of the axis has changed to visible.

db:section.db:title: onVisibleChanged(bool visible)
db:section.db:para: Visibility of the axis has changed to visible.
